Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were cultured in Dulbecco's modified Eagle medium (DMEM) supplemented with 10% FCS and antibiotics. SH-SY5Y cells were cultured in DMEM nutrient mixture F-12 HAM supplemented with 10% FCS, and antibiotics.

Readout description.Result Description: I2020T LRRK2 showed higher susceptibility to post-translational degradation compared to wild-type LRRK2, with protein levels significantly lower in untreated conditions.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed with multiple cell lines and clones (HEK293 and SH-SY5Y).

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control for comparison with I2020T mutant.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected cells expressing only endogenous LRRK2 were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA was used for statistical comparisons.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels comparable to wild-type LRRK2 under untreated conditions.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels significantly lower than wild-type LRRK2 due to increased degradation.

Material used.Description: HEK293 and SH-SY5Y cells were transfected with WT or I2020T LRRK2 cDNA and treated with hydrogen peroxide to induce apoptosis.

Readout description.Result Description: I2020T LRRK2-transfected cells showed a significantly higher percentage of apoptotic cells compared to WT LRRK2-transfected cells, indicating impaired protectivity against H2O2-induced apoptosis.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed with multiple cell lines and clones (HEK293 and SH-SY5Y).

Technical replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated with n=3 as indicated in statistical analysis.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control for comparison with I2020T mutant.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected cells expressing only endogenous LRRK2 were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA was used for statistical comparisons.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Percentage of apoptotic cells significantly lower than untransfected cells, comparable to WT LRRK2-transfected cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Percentage of apoptotic cells similar to or higher than untransfected cells, indicating impaired protectivity.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells transfected with WT or I2020T LRRK2 cDNA were analyzed for caspase-9 activation after H2O2 treatment.

Readout description.Result Description: Higher molecular ratio of activated to inactive caspase-9 in I2020T LRRK2-transfected cells compared to WT LRRK2-transfected cells, indicating reduced protectivity against apoptosis.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed with multiple transfections.

Technical replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated with n=3 as indicated in statistical analysis.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control for comparison with I2020T mutant.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected cells expressing only endogenous LRRK2 were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA was used for statistical comparisons.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Molecular ratio of activated to inactive caspase-9 lower than untransfected cells, comparable to WT LRRK2-transfected cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Molecular ratio of activated to inactive caspase-9 higher than WT LRRK2-transfected cells, indicating impaired protectivity.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were co-transfected with WT LRRK2 cDNA and LRRK2-specific RNAi or control RNAi to assess the effect of protein level on apoptosis protectivity.

Readout description.Result Description: This assay focused on WT LRRK2 knockdown effects; specific results for I2020T variant not described in this context.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed with multiple transfections.

Basic positive control.Description: WT LRRK2 with control RNAi was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected cells or cells with LRRK2-specific RNAi reducing protein levels were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Statistical method not specified for this specific assay in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability comparable to WT LRRK2-transfected cells without knockdown.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant reduction in cell viability due to decreased LRRK2 protein levels after knockdown.
